verses.roman:
cāri-dike cāri sampradāya uccaiḥsvare gāya
madhye tāṇḍava-nṛtya kare gaurarāya

synonyms: cāri-dike—on four sides; cāri sampradāya—the four groups; uccaiḥ-svare—very loudly; gāya—chant; madhye—in the middle; tāṇḍava-nṛtya—jumping and dancing; kare—performs; gaurarāya—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: On all four sides the four saṅkīrtana groups chanted very loudly, and in the middle Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu danced, jumping high.
